thread.section_title: AFEyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AFEyewear | afeyewear.com
thread.title: Gerald Myers

author: Gerald Myers
title: Gerald Myers
text: Easy to use website that allowed me to quickly order prescription sunglasses with progressive lenses. Easy to use filters saved time by eliminating frames that would not support progressive lenses. A rep contacted me by phone the next day to see if i had any questions and to let me know they had everything to process my order and how long it would take. My order was completed was completed ahead of schedule and arrived to me in less than three weeks.
